sections.title: 6,000 Applications, Zero Offers: The Skills Mismatch Crisis
sections.subtitle: Quantifying the growing divide between available talent and required skills.
bullets: Computer Science graduate: 6,000 applications, 13 interviews, 0 offers.
238,964 tech workers laid off across 2024-2025.
41% of college graduates underemployed despite skills shortage.
sections.script: The numbers tell a devastating story. While qualified graduates send thousands of applications into the void, specialized roles requiring cybersecurity, cloud computing, and data engineering skills remain unfilled. This isn't a talent shortage—it's a precision skills gap that traditional education can't solve.
sections.image_prompt: A frustrated graduate surrounded by stacks of job applications, contrasted with empty tech job postings.

sections.title: The Bureau of Labor Statistics Confirms Our Thesis
sections.subtitle: Government data validates the growing demand for specialized skills and micro-credentials.
bullets: Future growth concentrated in specialized roles requiring 'domain knowledge and human judgment'.
Skills-first hiring approaches gaining momentum across industries.
AI cannot replicate specialized human expertise—but can teach it efficiently.
sections.script: Government data validates what we've built. The Bureau of Labor Statistics projects job growth will come from specialized expertise—exactly what Presgen targets. We're not fighting AI replacement; we're using AI to teach the skills that make humans irreplaceable.
sections.image_prompt: A graph showing projected job growth in specialized fields, overlaid with the Bureau of Labor Statistics logo.

sections.title: AI-Generated Microlearning: From Assessment to Mastery
sections.subtitle: Presgen's four-component solution for personalized, efficient skills training.
bullets: Presgen-Core: Generates tailored presentations for any skill gap.
Presgen-Data: Inserts relevant charts and real-world data automatically.
Presgen-Video: Creates engaging video content with AI-generated key points.
sections.script: Traditional education fails because it's one-size-fits-all. Presgen succeeds because it's one-size-fits-one. Our AI assesses your current skills, identifies gaps, and generates personalized training for exactly what you're missing. Not a semester—a week.
sections.image_prompt: A diagram illustrating Presgen's four components working together to create a personalized learning path.

sections.title: What You're Witnessing: AI Teaching AI
sections.subtitle: A live demonstration of Presgen's capabilities in real-time content generation.
bullets: This presentation was generated by Presgen-Core in under 3 minutes.
Data visualizations inserted automatically based on skills gap research.
Real-time proof of concept: AI creating educational content about AI's impact.
sections.script: What you're experiencing right now is meta-innovation. You're watching an AI-generated presentation, narrated by an AI avatar, about an AI platform—all created specifically for your learning context. This is the future of education: instant, personalized, and precisely targeted.
sections.image_prompt: A screenshot of the Presgen interface generating a presentation, with data visualizations and avatar controls visible.

sections.title: Why OpenAI Grove: Scaling from Proof to Platform
sections.subtitle: Leveraging Grove's resources and network to accelerate Presgen's impact.
bullets: Early access to advanced models = enhanced content generation quality.
OpenAI researcher mentorship = optimized educational AI algorithms.
Grove network = collaborative innovation for global education challenges.
sections.script: We're not just seeking acceleration—we're offering demonstration. Presgen shows how OpenAI's technology can solve real-world problems affecting millions. With Grove's support, we can scale from helping individual jobseekers to transforming global workforce development.
sections.image_prompt: The OpenAI Grove logo alongside the Presgen logo, symbolizing a strategic partnership.

sections.title: The $366 Billion EdTech Market Needs Precision Training
sections.subtitle: Presgen addresses the intersection of EdTech, corporate training, and skills-based hiring.
bullets: Global EdTech market: $366 billion by 2025.
Corporate training market: $366 billion annually.
Skills-based hiring growing 8x faster than overall hiring.
sections.script: We're not competing with traditional education—we're completing it. The EdTech market is massive but scattered. Presgen creates a new category: AI-generated microlearning for precision reskilling. We turn the skills gap from a crisis into a market opportunity.
sections.image_prompt: A pie chart illustrating the size and growth of the EdTech, corporate training, and skills-based hiring markets.

sections.title: Working Demo Beats Perfect Pitch
sections.subtitle: Presgen's integrated platform demonstrates technical feasibility and scalability.
bullets: Four integrated components built and functioning.
End-to-end pipeline from skill assessment to certificate completion.
Real-time content generation demonstrated in this presentation.
sections.script: Accelerators see hundreds of pitches. Most are ideas. Some are prototypes. Presgen is a working platform. Every component you've seen demonstrated is live, integrated, and ready to scale. We're not asking you to imagine the future—we're showing it to you.
sections.image_prompt: A screenshot of the Presgen platform's dashboard, showcasing its various features and functionalities.

sections.title: Grove Partnership: From Demo to Disruption
sections.subtitle: A phased approach to scaling Presgen with OpenAI's resources and expertise.
bullets: Phase 1: Leverage Grove mentorship to optimize AI educational algorithms.
Phase 2: Integrate early access OpenAI models for enhanced content quality.
Phase 3: Scale through Grove network for pilot partnerships.
sections.script: Grove isn't just an accelerator for us—it's a strategic partnership. OpenAI's mission to ensure AI benefits humanity aligns perfectly with democratizing education. Together, we can prove that AI's highest value isn't replacing humans, but empowering them with precisely the skills they need to thrive.
sections.image_prompt: A timeline illustrating the phased approach to scaling Presgen with OpenAI Grove, highlighting key milestones and deliverables.

sections.title: The Crisis is Now. The Solution is Ready. The Partnership is Perfect.
sections.subtitle: A call to action to address the skills gap crisis with Presgen and OpenAI Grove.
bullets: 238,964 laid-off tech workers need reskilling NOW.
Specialized skills gaps growing faster than traditional education can address.
Presgen-Grove partnership = AI-powered education at OpenAI scale.
sections.script: This isn't a request for funding or mentorship—it's an invitation to partnership. Presgen solves a crisis affecting millions using OpenAI's technology in ways that showcase its potential for social good. The question isn't whether AI will transform education. The question is whether OpenAI will lead that transformation with us.
sections.image_prompt: A diverse group of people learning and collaborating, symbolizing the impact of Presgen and OpenAI Grove on global education.
